text: Balalena, take tataksana tomadera sathe pathaba na, yataksana tomara amake allahara name angikara na da'o ye, take abasya'i amara kache paumche debe; kintu yadi tomara saba'i ekanta'i asahaya na haye ya'o. Atahpara yakhana saba'i tamke angikara dila, takhana tini balalenah amadera madhye ya kathabarta halo se byapare allaha'i madhyastha ra'ilena.
